```{r}
delayed_discharge_df <- read_csv(here("raw_data/delayed-discharge-beddays-health-board.csv")) %>%
  clean_names()

```

```{r}
#use this
delayed_discharge_df <- delayed_discharge_df %>% 
  mutate(datetime = ym(month_of_delay), .after = month_of_delay) %>% 
  filter(datetime >= "2018-04-01")
```


```{r}
summarise(count = n()) %>% 
ggplot() + 
  aes(x = datetime, y = count) +
  geom_line()
```



```{r}
delayed_discharge <- delayed_discharge_df %>% 
  filter(!age_group == "18plus") %>% 
  filter(!reason_for_delay == "All Delay Reasons") %>% 
  group_by(datetime) %>% 
  summarise(datetime, ave_num = mean(number_of_delayed_bed_days)) 
ggplot() + 
  aes(x = datetime) +
 geom_line(aes(y = ave_num, colour = "#603BF2"))+
  scale_alpha_continuous() 
ggplotly(delayed_discharge)
```
